author: James Martin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Place the cheese in a box on a baking sheet and sprinkle with the thyme leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Place in the oven and bake for 10-12 minutes, or until just beginning to melt. Remove from the oven and serve on a plate with the chopped pepper pieces and rustic bread pieces beside.
ingredients: 1 cheese in a box (such as Pont l'Évêque),  1 tbsp fresh thyme leaves,  ½ tbsp olive oil,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  ½ red romero pepper, seeds removed and chopped,  rustic white bread, broken up, to serve
